Message:
Big Sis and I were abandoned
on top of a mountain.

There, thunder and lightning
were always crashing down.

I got scared and tried to run
away from the noise,
but before I knew it,
I had ended up all alone.

The mountain’s too dark
to see anything at night,

and the thunder’s so loud
I can’t hear Big Sis’s voice.
I’ll never see Big Sis again...!

I started crying,
but before I knew it,

there she was—
somehow Big Sis had found me.

“It’s okay, Cerberus.
Big Sis is here,” she said,
wrapping her warm arms
around me.

The thunder and lightning
were still crashing down,
but my tears had stopped.

And it’s all because I have
the best big sis in the
whole world.
